agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Higher Education TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Wednesday, May 1, 2019 PLACE: E1.028 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Brandon Creighton HB 277 Oliverson | et al. SP: Creighton Relating to a requirement that online admission application forms for public institutions of higher education include a link to certain comparative gainful employment data. HB 1065 Ashby | et al. SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the establishment of a rural resident physician grant program. HB 1702 Howard | et al. SP: Hancock Relating to services provided for students at public institutions of higher education who are or were in foster care. HB 1735 Howard | et al. SP: Watson Relating to sexual harassment, sexual assault, dating violence, and stalking at public and private postsecondary educational institutions; providing an administrative penalty. HB 2963 Clardy SP: Nichols Relating to the conveyance of certain state forest land in Cherokee County under the control of the board of regents of The Texas A&M University System. SB 1635 Zaffirini Relating to medical and dental clinical education in public and nonprofit hospitals. Pending business. Those wishing to give public testimony, please limit prepared remarks to 3 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please submit 20 copies, with your name on each copy, to the Committee during the hearing. Bills added after last posting: HB 1735 Bills deleted after last posting: SB 2000 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
